page.title: 08Hatfield Broad Oak Shops
page.content: There are currently six shops in the village: the Post Office and general stores, the butcher's, the newsagent, an electrical shop and an antique shop; a further small shop building housing a craft and gift business is at present featuring a closing down sale. In addition to the shops there is a small nursery run from a bungalow near the bottom of Feathers Hill and an apple orchard in the grounds of the house called 'Great Chalks' (the former vicarage) from which apples are sold during the autumn. In former years there were a number of other shops in the village and several buildings now occupied solely as homes were once business premises as well. House names such as 'The Old Forge' and 'Old Post House' are everyday reminders of this.
